alert.note: Alert for Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 4:54PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL CHURCHILL AND CENTRAL LYON COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM PDT... At 452 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Wabuska, or 17 miles south of Lahontan Reservoir, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and blowing dust reducing visibility below 3 miles. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Churchill Station and Silver Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
